name: Heartfelt: Dragon Crest
description:
Overview

A cute, short action-adventure where you play as an adventurer that can steal dragon abilities to defeat monsters!

Luca has awoken to find that she has no memories, no powers, but great responsibilities.

Each time you defeat a dragon, you can pick up the magic it knows to cast it once yourself.

Controls

WASD: Movement

Mouse: Camera controls

Left Mouse Click: Melee attack

Alpha 1: Fire ability

Alpha 2: Earthquake ability
